title: Grab a Kate Spade Tote and Wallet for 60% Off, Today Only
text:
Sometimes, you really just need a bag you can throw all of your stuff into and call it a day. Well, Kate Spade has just the bag for that and it's 60% off today only with code PERFECT. The Abbott Large Tote, paired with the Jackson Street wallet, are on sale for $149.

The large tote is made from a pebbled leather with plenty of room, and pockets, for all your daily needs. But if you need some more organization, the wallet is there for you. It has six card slots for everything from your ID to your subway card. Choose from four colors: Black, Blazer Blue, Hot Chili, and Pale Vellum. Go monotone or mix and match colors. If you want an all-in-one package, this is the deal for you. | Shop at Kate Spade >

Scouted selects products independently and prices reflect what was available at the time of publish. Sign up for our newsletter for more recommendations and deals. Curious about a specific product or brand? Let us know! If you buy something from our posts, we may earn a small commission.
description: You get a large, durable tote and a matching wallet to go with.
